This is a cross browser Javascript calendar. 12 languages are currently 
supported. 
http://www.dhtmlgoodies.com/index.html?page=calendarScripts

Xmlnuke uses a unchanged version of DHTMLGoodies Calendar.

The current DHTMLGoodies Calendar edition is 2.1

To use in your XSL you MUST add the follow snippets:
- HTMLHEADERS inside <head> section
- HTMLBODY at the end of document

All changes made by João Gilberto Magalhães at 2008-05-18
